bugs.title: CVE-2021-46141 uriparser: Invalid free operations in uriFreeUriMembers and uriMakeOwner [epel-8]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2021-46141 uriparser: Invalid free operations in uriFreeUriMembers and uriMakeOwner [epel-8]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2021-46141 uriparser: Invalid free operations in uriFreeUriMembers and uriMakeOwner

long_desc.thetext:
An issue was discovered in uriparser before 0.9.6. It performs invalid free operations in uriFreeUriMembers and uriMakeOwner.

References:

https://github.com/uriparser/uriparser/issues/121
https://github.com/uriparser/uriparser/pull/124

Created mingw-uriparser tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2037918]


Created uriparser tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-8 [bug 2037919]
Affects: fedora-all [bug 2037917]

This bug is now closed. Further updates for individual products will be reflected on the CVE page(s):

https://access.redhat.com/security/cve/cve-2021-46141

This is an automatically created tracking bug!  It was created to ensure
that one or more security vulnerabilities are fixed in affected versions
of epel-8.

For comments that are specific to the vulnerability please use bugs filed
against the "Security Response" product referenced in the "Blocks" field.

For more information see:
http://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Security/TrackingBugs

When submitting as an update, use the fedpkg template provided in the next

Please also mention the CVE IDs being fixed in the RPM changelog and the

this tracking bug.  This will ensure that all associated bugs get updated
